Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is an easier and on the spot option whereas getting feedback from your teacher may take a few days - if you are in a crunch, it is a lot easier to use AI although less accurate and relevant.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
Neither feedback has made me feel any way, I usually take feedback as constructive criticism rather than something to have an emotional response to.
Feedback from teachers does aid in making me feel like I do or do not understand the general content however.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Feedback from AI can be too specific or too general whereas from a teacher it will always be in relation to the content which is more beneficial in the long run.
